content: this is a summary of a legal text regarding a court decision made by the district court in ljubljana the court case involved the division of goods in an inheritance the court fee for the procedure was 40500 eur which the second heir is responsible for paying the procedure lasted for 10 months and 12 days starting from january 4 2021 and ending on november 15 2021 the goods have a total value of 26600 eur and there are three heirs involved according to the law each heir is entitled to 13 of the goods but there are adjustments in this case the widower of the deceased will receive 13 of the goods the son of the deceased will receive 23 of the goods and the third heir has chosen to waive their share the court decision is based on certain articles of the inheritance act the court received responses on november 15 2021 and decided to withdraw the proposal to limit the succession the estate of the deceased includes a real estate property and unpaid pension funds the court held a probate hearing for a deceased person who was married and had two children since there was no will the intestate succession rules apply one child accepted their share while the other waived their share and accepted a ceded share resulting in them receiving 23 of the estate the court has determined the extent of the estate and the heirs need to finalize the registration of property and arrange the transfer of property and withdrawal of funds the court received a proposal for the limitation of succession but it was later withdrawn the net value of the estate is estimated at 2660000 eur and the court has assessed the funeral costs claim from the municipality of ljubljana and court fee the text also provides instructions for lodging an appeal including the time limit and requirements the appeal must be filed with the appropriate court and clearly state the order being appealed the parts of the decision being contested and the reasons for the appeal the court fee must be paid within the specified time limit the document concludes with the date and location which is march 10 2022 in ljubljana
